CmdLine: apk --no-cache add                         curl                         libintl                         python3-dev                         libsodium-dev                         openssl-dev                         udns-dev                         mbedtls-dev                         pcre-dev                         libev-dev                         libtool                         libffi-dev            &&      apk --no-cache add --virtual .build-deps                         tar                         make                         gettext                         py3-pip                         autoconf                         automake                         build-base                         linux-headers         &&      ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python   &&      ln -s /usr/bin/pip3    /usr/bin/pip      &&      cp  /usr/bin/envsubst  /usr/local/bin/   &&      pip install --upgrade pip                &&      pip install -r requirements.txt          &&      rm -rf ~/.cache && touch /etc/hosts.deny &&      apk del --purge .build-deps
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: envsubst < apiconfig.py > userapiconfig.py &&     envsubst < config.json > user-config.json  &&     echo -e "${DNS_1}\n${DNS_2}\n" > dns.conf  &&     python server.py
Commands.Name: cmd
